zh-cn: 一个简单的管理本地音乐的音乐播放器，用户界面基于Groove Music。这个App我只是写着玩给自己用，不过你一定要用我也不勉强哈哈。
en: A Simple Music Player that manages local music files based on the UI of Groove Music.
en-us: A Simple Music Player that manages local music files based on the UI of Groove Music. And I just write this app for fun and for myself. If you insist on using it, don't blame me on bugs.

zh-cn: 1. 支持多选   2. 迷你模式支持随机播放   3. 优化了最近添加   4. 支持MP3文件用简音播放器打开
en: 1. Multi-select support   2. Mini mode supports random play.   3. Improved Recent Played   4. Supports open mp3 files with SMPlayer
en-us: 1. Multi-select support   2. Mini mode supports random play.   3. Improved Recent Played   4. Supports open mp3 files with SMPlayer

zh-cn: 一个简单的音乐播放器。
